verses.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isrighteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
Let them be as the grass uponthe housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*beupon you: we bless you in the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
